text:
Was Anna Faris actually uncomfortable watching Chris Pratt and Zoe Saldana’s romantic scenes in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2? That’s the claim in one of this week’s new tabloids, but Gossip Cop has the exclusive truth.

According to Star, Faris wasn’t happy seeing her husband “cozy up” to Saldana on the big screen during last month’s premiere of the upcoming Marvel movie. A supposed “spy” tells the magazine that the actress “was squirming in her seat” and even tried to leave the theater at one point. “Chris pulled her back down and held her hand, but Anna looked like she just wanted to disappear,” adds the outlet’s questionable source.

© Gossip Cop (Getty Images)

Of course, Faris herself is an actress who’s been in the business for a long time and has had many of her own on-screen love interests. She and Pratt both understand that pretending to be romantically involved with other people is simply part of the job. Regardless, Gossip Cop still checked in with a reliable source close to the situation, who exclusively assures us Faris wasn’t the least bit upset about her husband’s intimate scenes with Saldana.

In fact, this isn’t the first time Star has tried to force the couple into a nonexistent love triangle. Gossip Cop previously busted the tabloid when it falsely claimed Faris and Pratt’s marriage was in trouble over his Passengers co-star Jennifer Lawrence. We also debunked the magazine’s bogus story alleging Faris was worried about Pratt cheating on her. This latest article is simply more fake news from the frequently unreliable publication.
title: Anna Faris Uncomfortable Watching Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana Romantic Scenes?
